data.name: BlenderKit [FREE]
data.tagline: BlenderKit official add-on

data.name: 3D Print Prep Wizard [FREE]
data.tagline: Auto-detect thin walls, non-watertight meshes, overhangs; offer fixes

data.name: Add-on Install button [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Advanced Plot Equation [FREE]
data.tagline: Plot explicit, parametric curves & surfaces in Blender

data.name: AI Material Generator [FREE]
data.tagline: Generate seamless PBR materials from text prompts

data.name: Animation Render Time Estimation [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Arrange objects evenly in a circle [FREE]
data.tagline: The addon arranges all selected objects evenly in a circle. The radius and orientation of the circle (X, Y, Z axis) can be controlled.

data.name: Aspect Ratio [FREE]
data.tagline: A Blender addon for managing aspect ratios and camera settings with an intuitive interface and quick access pie menu.

data.name: Babylon Scene Preview Pro [FREE]
data.tagline: All-in-one .glb exporter & live-preview with screenshot + grid toggle + Blender-style grid.

data.name: BagaPie [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: BasedPlayblast [FREE]
data.tagline: Easily create playblasts within Blender and Flamenco

data.name: batch_render_manager [FREE]
data.tagline: A Blender addon for efficient batch rendering from multiple cameras with advanced project management features.

data.name: Bulk FBX Importer [FREE]
data.tagline: FBX Vault is a bulk FBX importer for Blender that lets you load multiple FBX files at once, saving time and streamlining your workflow.

data.name: Cad measuring tool [FREE]
data.tagline: It's a geo nodes based tool that lets you make measurements and render them with ease

data.name: Cake Particles [FREE]
data.tagline: Allows you to bake the motion of particles into key-framed objects animations. (❁´◡`❁)

data.name: Camera bookmark manager [FREE]
data.tagline: Remember camera positions and orientation and conveniently assign them to another camera.

data.name: Card/Keychain w/ Custom Design and QR Generation and opt. NFC Cavity for 3D Printing [FREE]
data.tagline: This add-on lets you design 3D-printable housings for NFC chips. You can add your own logos or icons (Wi-Fi symbol, social media logo, etc.), or use the built-in QR generator to put a backup code directly on the surface of the print.

data.name: Connect image alpha [FREE]
data.tagline: Connecting image alpha to shader alpha

data.name: Copy Transforms [FREE]
data.tagline: The Copy Transforms add-on mimic the Autodesk Maya copy transform functions. The operations only work in Object Mode and can be done between objects, lights and cameras. Plug-in updated to version 2.0.

data.name: Countdown 3d [FREE]
data.tagline: Quickly add customizable 3D timers (countdown or count‑up) to your Blender viewport.

data.name: Delete Static Animation Channels [FREE]
data.tagline: Automatically identify and remove redundant F-Curves with constant keyframe values to clean up and optimize your animation data on a click.

data.name: Dimensions and Lines [FREE]
data.tagline: create technical drawings, dimensions and lines

data.name: Flickering Light Simulator [FREE]
data.tagline: Customizable flickering light animation with multilingual support

data.name: Flow5 - The Ultimate Asset Tool [FREE]
data.tagline:
Flow5 is the amazing (and FREE!) workflow tool that helps you with building your scenes, creating asset libraries, manage your assets and even more! Already trusted by thousands of users

Learn more at: https://polyspaace.com/addons/flow

data.name: item transform [FREE]
data.tagline: A Blender addon that provides quick transform operations for selected objects with an intuitive interface and additional utility functions.

data.name: JoinForce Animation Render [FREE]
data.tagline:
This add-on helps you use all your computers to render animation all together, like network rendering but limited to a local or shared folder (e.g., a NAS drive). Collaborate with others and speed up your production.

Preparation → Render → Collect.

data.name: K-Tools Render Preset Manager [FREE]
data.tagline: An easy and intuitive for saving, loading, and managing complete render setting profiles for Cycles, EEVEE, and Workbench. This tool is designed to streamline your workflow, allowing for quick, consistent, and reversible changes to your rende

data.name: Material Organizer [FREE]
data.tagline: Overview of all materials in the scene. Easy deletion of unused materials. The list can also be sorted by name, used or unused, procedural, and size. Finally, a tidy material library again - very helpful, especially in large and complex scenes.

data.name: Material Viewport Color from Nodes [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Math 3D Equations Pro [FREE]
data.tagline: Math 3D Equations Pro lets you turn math formulas into 3D geometry: plot functions, parametric curves/surfaces, implicit fields (with marching cubes), and strange attractors directly inside Blender.

data.name: Maya Viewport Operations [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Maze Generator [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Measure and Scale [FREE]
data.tagline: Measure and Scale object uniformaly

data.name: MeLiDA - Measure LiDAR System [FREE]
data.tagline: MeLiDA integrates LiDAR sensors with Blender to create professional surveys of buildings, structures, and their relics—built for architects, constructors, conservators of monuments, archaeologists and engineers.

data.name: Music Generator [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Node Color Tools Pie [FREE]
data.tagline: Elevate your workflow with the Pie Menus of Node Color Tools Pie, the add-on for managing node colors in Blender. Designed for clarity and speed, this tool allows you to color multiple nodes at once, making it easier to navigate complex node trees.

data.name: Number Generator [FREE]
data.tagline: Create sequential numbers as text objects

data.name: Pomodoro Timer [FREE]
data.tagline: Boost your productivity with this amazing N-Panel widget! If your computer cannot render faster, work smarter! This add-on integrates seamlessly into Blender, offering structured work sessions and breaks to keep you immersed in creative projects!

data.name: Procedural Scatter Brush [FREE]
data.tagline: Scatter objects on surfaces using brush strokes

data.name: Project time tracker [FREE]
data.tagline: Saves the time you spend working on different projects so you can always keep track of whether you are still within the agreed time frame.

data.name: Quick Asset Saver [FREE]
data.tagline: Streamline saving assets to your local asset libraries.

data.name: Quick Groups (Instances) [FREE]
data.tagline: Group objects with Ctrl+G using instances

data.name: QuickMat Bake Lite - Material to Texture Converter [FREE]
data.tagline: Bake procedural materials into image textures in one click. Simple, fast, and essential for exporting Blender materials.

data.name: Quick Origin Power Suite: Ultimate Pivot & Alignment Tools [FREE]
data.tagline: Stop tedious alignment! 1-Click Origin to Bottom, World Snap, Smart Bake, and Batch Copy for game dev and asset creation.

data.name: QuickUndo: Sidebar Undo/Redo for All Modes [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Random Design For Abstract Art 1.1.4 [FREE]
data.tagline: Generate abstract art with randomized shapes, remixable layouts, and smart arrangements like wave or spiral. Enhance with creative effects like Biopunk, Ectoplasm, Alien, one-click transparency, and randomized vibrant color harmonies.

data.name: Raster Crafter v1.3.3 [FREE]
data.tagline: Transform images into art with adaptive resolution & displacement driven by fractal image detail,  or alpha maps; waves flutter; gradual resolution, displacement & gap; echo morphing; Perlin & fBM noise; full light control; true kaleidoscope;

data.name: RenderSceneKit [FREE]
data.tagline: Quickly add pre-built studio scenes for render

data.name: ScriptPilot [FREE]
data.tagline: A lightweight add-on to increase search and navigation functionality of the text editor with dynamic bookmarking of classes and functions and text searched persisting through blender save states.

data.name: Set to wire Boolean quick set [FREE]
data.tagline:
This addon simply sets the selected object to wireframe, addons a Boolean modifier to the active and sets the selected as the objects. In other words, it does all the work for you in 1-click :)

Check the quick video for details but it's easy to use.

data.name: Shape Keys Batch Transfer Addon [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Shot Handler Lite [FREE]
data.tagline:
Create Presets or different Shot Settings.
Switch Scene Cameras, Collection Groups, Render Settings and more with the press of a Button.

data.name: Shot Manager 2 Lite [FREE]
data.tagline: Render, layer and camera management

data.name: Smart AutoSave+ Pro - NovaStrikes [FREE]
data.tagline:
Intelligent autosave with triggers, crash recovery, profiles, and pop-up notifications.
Save your hours of works without any fear.

data.name: Super Project Manager [FREE]
data.tagline: NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED

data.name: Swap Render Orientation [FREE]
data.tagline: Swap Render Orientation lets you instantly switch between Landscape and Portrait mode with a single button click or F8 shortcut – saving time and keeping your work
